The Governor, Lieutenant Governor And Council, Certain Officers Under The Governor And Council, And State Library

law.catch_line: Failure To Comply With Registration Requirements; Right To Arrest
law.text: Whenever a police officer has probable cause to believe that a sex offender has failed to comply with the registration requirements of sections 178C to 178P, inclusive, such officer shall have the right to arrest such sex offender without a warrant and to keep such sex offender in custody.
